item.title: Testing Hugo content creation with Obsidian
item.description: Testing to see how obsidian can be used for writing hugo posts. This is my current setup in obsidian. This is relative path to the file This is absolute path in the vault. Shortest path possible.

item.title: I like to roar
item.description: Hi, quick update from me. I just want to let everyone know that I like roaring. Testing. Test A nice quote from someone. Some other text. Blah blah blah. Some other text. item.title: Today I made friends
item.description: I got lost in the woods today. Two friends, a Meerkat and a Warthog, found me, sung a song with me and gave my life new meaning. Today was a good day.

item.title: Vegan experiment
item.description: I tried to become a vegan today. This is a test.
Testing image upload functionality from Obsidian.

item.title: Hello from Tinacms
